mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of Clay County W. Va / compiled by H. B. Davenport, 1907
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Davenport, Henry B. (Henry Bedinger), 1865-1958 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : blue line print ; 90 x 125 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Oriented with north to the upper right. [original]
"This is the first and only map of Clay County ever made." [original]

N.B. This map shows all the large tracts and about four fifths of the small tracts. It was compiled from a large number of independent maps of the various tracts, and is therefore subject to errors contained in those maps. [original]
Map shows major landowners, businesses, roads, waterways, and districts. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Real property--West Virginia--Clay County--Maps
Clay County (W. Va.)--Maps
